page.title: 14Housing.
page.content: Most of the housing in our area is modern although there is one noticeable exception,a Georgian manor house.Most of the houses have been built since the Second World War.We discovered by interviewing children at Reculver School that less than half of them have born in the area.Quite a large number were born in London.most of them came to live here about five to ten years ago and most moved into new or nearly new homes.Most children lived in houses but bungalows seem very popular with older people near retirement, there are te a number of older people in our block.House prices range from about 30,000 to 90,000 pounds although most are priced at about 45,000.Nearly every atch of spare ground is soon bought up bbuilders and new houses and bungalows built.
